name: EnergyAdvisor
0:
”Alexa, open energy advisor”
”Alexa, ask energy advisor to lookup how many watts a well pump uses”
”Alexa, ask energy advisor to find out what a vacuum uses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy advisor
des:
Get the energy usage of items in the home and in the garage. The results are all in watts. This includes home appliances, building tools, and lighting.

Some included items:
-Dishwasher
-100 Watt LED Bulb
-Gaming Computer
-Band Saw
-Hair Dryer
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
